Hi there. My name is Kat and I am a PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania studying Quantitative Methods. I am interested in how applied statistics and data science can inform business processes and policy research.

I also like to play guitar.


This site is a working portfolio. You can also read my writing on [Towards Data Science](https://towardsdatascience.com/@katjanewilson), see some code on [GitHub](https://github.com/katjanewilson), or check out my [LinkedIn Page](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kat-wilson-920256139/)
